name: CreateJobApplication
description:
Creates a job application for a candidate.

Use this tool to create a job application for a candidate when sourcing for a job posting. Ensure you have the 'candidatesWrite' permission. This tool is not for job boards; refer to 'applicationForm.submit' for that purpose.

parameters.name: job_application_details
parameters.description: JSON object containing candidateId, jobId, interviewPlanId, interviewStageId, sourceId, creditedToUserId, createdAt, and applicationHistory for creating a job application.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the Ashby API
